name: Daylight Dash
description: Rev your engines! One hot pink car is gonna zoom past a seemingly endless highway! Rack up points on challenging difficulties and use them to unlock skins and levels! Levels with different speeds and settings with different obstacles. Wanna knock barrels of TNT into traveling minecarts? Try out Gold-Gate! Wanna avoid futuristic police on a raving speedway? Try Techno Turnpike! Wanna collect power-ups at dawn while a powerful green car fires laser beams at you? Try AmenazaVerde! Every stage brings something new to the table and it's up to you to take up the dare! Are you up for the challenge?
